cab.content:
Colonel Jones
(This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
G.T. 3153
SECRET.
Operations.
From :- General Delme Radcliffe, Italy.
To :- C.I.G.S., War Office.
Handed in 3.30 a.m. 30th December, 1917.
Received 11.45 a.m. 30th December, 1917.
10081. December 29th. Situation evening.
On the whole front situation is unchanged. Some patrol actions on fronts of 3rd and 1st Armies with results which were favourable to Italians.
Aerial activity. On night December 27th/December 28th enemy made aircraft raids and dropped bombs near Monte Belluna on Treviso and on Padov. 73 casualties at latter place of which 13 were killed. Slight snow has fallen in the mountains.
